abstract: Better Homes and Garden announces pending retirement of chief editor Gayle Butler is retiring, to be succeeded by Stephen Orr, executive editor at Conde Nast Traveler.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Orr, the executive editor at Condé Nast Traveler and former editorial director for Martha Stewart Living, will succeed Gayle Butler.

headline.main: Better Homes and Gardens Says Chief Editor Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Better Homes and Gardens Says Chief Editor Will Retire

snippet: Stephen Orr, the executive editor at Condé Nast Traveler and former editorial director for Martha Stewart Living, will succeed Gayle Butler.
